Album: Premiere Performance Plus: Better Than A Hallelujah
Lyric:
[by:KRees]
[00:18.22]God loves a lullaby
[00:20.77]In a mother's tears in the dead of night
[00:24.35]Better than a hallelujah sometimes
[00:31.15]God loves a drunkard's cry
[00:33.71]The soldier's plea not to let him die
[00:37.15]Better than a hallelujah sometimes
[00:43.40]We pour out our miseries
[00:46.45]God just hears a melody
[00:49.65]Beautiful the mess we are
[00:52.80]The honest cries, of breaking hearts
[01:00.00]Are better than a hallelujah
[01:02.87]
[01:15.70]A woman holding on for life
[01:18.44]A dying man giving up the fight
[01:21.70]Are better than a hallelujah sometimes
[01:28.60]Tears of shame for what's been done
[01:31.22]The silence when the words won't come
[01:34.55]Are better than a hallelujah sometimes
[01:40.95]We pour out our miseries
[01:44.10]God just hears a melody
[01:47.36]Beautiful the mess we are
[01:50.50]The honest cries, of breaking hearts
[01:57.67]Are better than a hallelujah
[02:01.20]Better than a church bell ringing
[02:04.33]Better than a choir singing out
[02:09.00]Singing out
[02:13.00]We pour out our miseries
[02:16.10]God just hears a melody
[02:19.33]Beautiful the mess we are
[02:22.40]The honest cries, of breaking hearts
[02:29.70]Are better than a hallelujah
[02:33.81]
[02:45.10]We pour out our miseries
[02:48.10]God just hears a melody
[02:51.46]Beautiful the mess we are
[02:54.33]The honest cries, of breaking hearts
[03:01.77]Are better than a hallelujah
